original_title: Hello! Project 春の大感謝 ひな祭りフェスティバル2013 完全盤
overview: Hello! Project Haru no Dai Kansha Hinamatsuri Festival 2013 Kanzenban (Hello！Project　春の大感謝 ひな祭りフェスティバル2013 完全盤) is a Blu-ray disc by Hello! Project, featuring all March 3rd performances from both Hello! Project Haru no Dai Kansha Hinamatsuri Festival 2013 ~Berryz Koubou 10 Nenme Totsunyuu Special~ and Hello! Project Haru no Dai Kansha Hinamatsuri Festival 2013 ~Thank You For Your Love!~ events. It will be released on July 10, 2013.  The festival celebrates Hinamatsuri (Girls' Day), along with the start of Berryz Koubou's 10th Anniversary. It was announced on December 14th, 2012. The performing acts will be Morning Musume, Berryz Koubou, ℃-ute, S/mileage, selected members of Hello! Pro Kenshuusei and SATOYAMA movement units.
title: Hello! Project Haru no Dai Kansha Hinamatsuri Festival 2013 Kanzenban
